alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 12:34PM EST until January 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...The northern Adirondacks, northern Champlain Valley, and eastern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Isolated power outages are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will develop around the evening commute, and continue tonight before tapering off early Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
